mapper.select: SELECT A.SO_ID ,A.MULTI_CYCL ,A.MULTI_CYCL_NM ,A.SEQ ,A.SEQ_NM ,A.BILL_MM ,A.BILL_DT ,A.BILL_ST_MM ,A.BILL_UNIT ,A.USE_ST_MM ,A.USE_ST_DT ,A.USE_ED_MM ,A.USE_ED_DT ,A.REAL_USE_ED_DT FROM (SELECT SO_ID ,MULTI_CYCL ,MULTI_CYCL_NM ,SEQ ,SEQ_NM ,BILL_MM ,BILL_DT ,BILL_ST_MM ,BILL_UNIT ,USE_ST_MM ,USE_ST_DT ,USE_ED_MM ,USE_ED_DT ,USE_ED_DT REAL_USE_ED_DT FROM TBLCH_MULTI_CYCL WHERE SO_ID = #{soId} AND MULTI_CYCL = #{multiCycl} AND SEQ = #{seq}) A

SELECT
A.SO_ID ,A.CHRG_CTGRY ,A.SVC_RATE_ITM_TYP_CD ,A.PROD_CD ,A.RATE_ITM_CD ,A.ACT_DT ,A.INACT_DT ,A.FCTR_CD ,A.FCTR_NO ,A.RATE_INFO_EXE_FL ,A.FCTR_REF_TYP ,A.TABLE_ID ,A.COLMN_ID ,A.COND_OPERATOR ,A.OPRND_REF_FL ,A.OPRND_CD_A ,A.OPRND_CD_B ,A.OPRND_FCTR_CD_A ,A.OPRND_FCTR_CD_B ,A.FCTR_VAL1 ,A.FCTR_VAL2 ,A.FCTR_VAL3 ,A.FCTR_VAL4 ,A.FCTR_VAL5 ,A.FCTR_VAL6 ,A.FCTR_VAL7 ,A.FCTR_VAL8 ,A.FCTR_VAL9 ,A.RATE_REF_FL ,A.RATE_VAL ,A.RATE_FCTR_CD ,A.CRNCY_CD ,A.DIS_SVC_RATE_ITM_TYP_CD ,A.DIVI_RATE_AMT ,A.QTY_REF_FL ,A.QTY ,A.QTY_FCTR_CD ,A.FCTR_CNT FROM (SELECT A.SO_ID ,B.CHRG_CTGRY ,B.SVC_RATE_ITM_TYP_CD ,B.PROD_CD ,A.RATE_ITM_CD ,A.ACT_DT ,A.INACT_DT ,A.FCTR_CD ,A.FCTR_NO ,A.RATE_INFO_EXE_FL ,A.FCTR_REF_TYP ,A.TABLE_ID ,A.COLMN_ID ,A.COND_OPERATOR ,A.OPRND_REF_FL ,A.OPRND_1 AS OPRND_CD_A ,A.OPRND_2 AS OPRND_CD_B ,A.OPRND_FCTR_CD_1 AS OPRND_FCTR_CD_A ,A.OPRND_FCTR_CD_2 AS OPRND_FCTR_CD_B ,A.FCTR_VAL1 ,A.FCTR_VAL2 ,A.FCTR_VAL3 ,A.FCTR_VAL4 ,A.FCTR_VAL5 ,A.FCTR_VAL6 ,A.FCTR_VAL7 ,A.FCTR_VAL8 ,A.FCTR_VAL9 ,A.RATE_REF_FL ,A.RATE_VAL ,A.RATE_FCTR_CD ,A.CRNCY_CD ,B.DIS_SVC_RATE_ITM_TYP_CD ,A.DIVI_RATE_AMT ,A.QTY_REF_FL ,A.QTY ,A.QTY_FCTR_CD ,(SELECT MAX(FCTR_NO) FROM IFNBRM_RATE_INFO C WHERE C.SO_ID = A.SO_ID AND C.RATE_ITM_CD = A.RATE_ITM_CD AND C.ACT_DT = A.ACT_DT AND C.INACT_DT = A.INACT_DT AND C.FCTR_REF_TYP IN ('T','F') GROUP BY RATE_ITM_CD, ACT_DT, INACT_DT) AS FCTR_CNT FROM IFNBRM_RATE_INFO A , IFNBRM_RATE_ITM_INFO B WHERE A.SO_ID = #{soId} AND A.SO_ID = B.SO_ID AND A.RATE_ITM_CD = B.RATE_ITM_CD AND B.RATE_LOCAT = 'B' AND B.CHRG_CTGRY = #{chrgCtgry} AND A.FCTR_REF_TYP IN ('T','F') AND A.ACT_DT <= #{endDate} AND A.INACT_DT >= #{startDate} AND B.ACT_DT <= #{endDate} AND B.INACT_DT >= #{startDate} ORDER BY B.DIS_SVC_RATE_ITM_TYP_CD,B.RATE_PRI_NO, A.RATE_ITM_CD,A.FCTR_VAL1, A.FCTR_VAL2,A.FCTR_VAL3, A.FCTR_VAL4,A.FCTR_VAL5,A.FCTR_VAL6,A.FCTR_VAL7,A.FCTR_VAL8,A.FCTR_VAL9, A.ACT_DT, A.FCTR_NO ) A

SELECT R.RATE_ITM_CD ,MAX(R.DAY_VAL) AS VAL1 ,MAX(R.DAILY_VAL) AS VAL2 ,MAX(R.UP_VAL) AS VAL3 ,MAX(R.UP_POS_VAL) AS VAL4 ,MAX(R.VAT_VAL) AS VAL5 FROM (SELECT RATE_ITM_CD ,CASE WHEN ATTR_CD = 'AT005' THEN ATTR_CD ELSE '' END AS DAY_YN ,CASE WHEN ATTR_CD = 'AT005' THEN ATTR_VAL ELSE '' END AS DAY_VAL ,CASE WHEN ATTR_CD = 'AT004' THEN ATTR_CD ELSE '' END AS DAILY_YN ,CASE WHEN ATTR_CD = 'AT004' THEN ATTR_VAL ELSE '' END AS DAILY_VAL ,CASE WHEN ATTR_CD = 'AT001' THEN ATTR_CD ELSE '' END AS UP_YN ,CASE WHEN ATTR_CD = 'AT001' THEN ATTR_VAL ELSE '' END AS UP_VAL ,CASE WHEN ATTR_CD = 'AT002' THEN ATTR_CD ELSE '' END AS UP_POS ,CASE WHEN ATTR_CD = 'AT002' THEN ATTR_VAL ELSE '' END AS UP_POS_VAL ,CASE WHEN ATTR_CD = 'AT003' THEN ATTR_CD ELSE '' END AS VAT ,CASE WHEN ATTR_CD = 'AT003' THEN ATTR_VAL ELSE '' END AS VAT_VAL FROM IFNBRM_RATE_ITM_ATTR_INFO WHERE SO_ID = #{soId} AND ACT_DT <= #{endDate} AND INACT_DT >= #{startDate} AND ATTR_CD IN ('AT004','AT001','AT002','AT005','AT003') AND RATE_ITM_CD IN (SELECT RATE_ITM_CD FROM IFNBRM_RATE_ITM_INFO A WHERE SO_ID = A.SO_ID AND A.CHRG_CTGRY ='R' AND A.RATE_LOCAT = 'B') ) R GROUP BY R.RATE_ITM_CD ORDER BY R.RATE_ITM_CD

SELECT R.RATE_ITM_CD ,'*' AS VAL1 ,MAX(R.DAILY_VAL) AS VAL2 ,MAX(R.PERCENT_VAL) AS VAL3 ,MAX(R.MOTHOD_VAL) AS VAL4 ,MAX(R.VAT_VAL) AS VAL5 FROM (SELECT RATE_ITM_CD ,CASE WHEN ATTR_CD = 'AT008' THEN ATTR_CD ELSE '' END AS DAILY_YN ,CASE WHEN ATTR_CD = 'AT008' THEN ATTR_VAL ELSE '' END AS DAILY_VAL ,CASE WHEN ATTR_CD = 'AT009' THEN ATTR_CD ELSE '' END AS PERCENT ,CASE WHEN ATTR_CD = 'AT009' THEN ATTR_VAL ELSE '' END AS PERCENT_VAL ,CASE WHEN ATTR_CD = 'AT082' THEN ATTR_CD ELSE '' END AS MOTHOD ,CASE WHEN ATTR_CD = 'AT082' THEN ATTR_VAL ELSE '' END AS MOTHOD_VAL ,CASE WHEN ATTR_CD = 'AT003' THEN ATTR_CD ELSE '' END AS VAT ,CASE WHEN ATTR_CD = 'AT003' THEN ATTR_VAL ELSE '' END AS VAT_VAL FROM IFNBRM_RATE_ITM_ATTR_INFO WHERE SO_ID = #{soId} AND ACT_DT <= #{endDate} AND INACT_DT >= #{startDate} AND ATTR_CD IN ('AT008','AT009','AT082','AT003') AND RATE_ITM_CD IN (SELECT RATE_ITM_CD FROM IFNBRM_RATE_ITM_INFO A WHERE SO_ID = A.SO_ID AND A.CHRG_CTGRY ='D' AND A.RATE_LOCAT = 'B') ) R GROUP BY R.RATE_ITM_CD ORDER BY R.RATE_ITM_CD
SELECT F.PROD_CD, F.FCTR_IN FROM (SELECT PROD_CD, F_IN AS FCTR_IN FROM VIFNPM_PROD_PRE_FCTR) F

SELECT RATE_ITM_CD ,MAX(CANCEL_CHRG_VAL) AS VAL1 FROM ( SELECT RATE_ITM_CD ,CASE WHEN ATTR_CD = 'AT039' THEN ATTR_CD ELSE '' END AS CANCEL_CHRG_YN ,CASE WHEN ATTR_CD = 'AT039' THEN ATTR_VAL ELSE '' END AS CANCEL_CHRG_VAL FROM IFNBRM_RATE_ITM_ATTR_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND SO_ID = #{soId} AND ACT_DT <= #{endDate} AND INACT_DT >= #{startDate} AND ATTR_CD IN ('AT039') AND RATE_ITM_CD IN (SELECT RATE_ITM_CD FROM IFNBRM_RATE_ITM_INFO A WHERE SO_ID = A.SO_ID AND A.CHRG_CTGRY ='Z' AND A.RATE_LOCAT = 'B') ) GROUP BY RATE_ITM_CD ORDER BY RATE_ITM_CD
